articles.content: Pregnant women who contract the coronavirus are more at risk for severe illness and death than non-pregnant women, a Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) analysis found. The agency has pr… [+2243 chars]

articles.title: Why COVID makes it more important than ever that pregnant (and breastfeeding) women take vitamin D - The Conversation UK
articles.description: As we are now approaching a long, dark, socially-isolated winter in the UK, adequate vitamin D supplementation has never been more important.

articles.title: As the Virus Rages, Some Are Convinced It’s Too Late to Stop It - The New York Times
articles.description: Coronavirus case counts are at record highs, yet many in states like Idaho are embracing a let-it-ride approach. One county with a hospital nearing capacity repealed its mask mandate.
